item.description:
Come join us in a relaxing atmosphere ... to work on your latest projects. Come and go as you please. Drinks and snacks are welcomed and some will be provided.

I'm sure I will be working on my holiday list. I may be stamping metals, wrapping ribbon roses, wiring some earrings ... by that time, I hope I'll be finished with the holiday cards and knitting projects. We'll see.

Abeille offers the use of jewelry tools at no charge. You are also welcome to register for the stamping studio ($10) during this time or bring any type of project you may have. There are also sewing machines available but space is limited so no big projects, please.

We'll have snacks so come join us. We will be there until 5:00pm (maybe 6).

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: FrEE: Meetup - Wrap up those Holiday Projects
